vclaim: An episode of "The Simpsons" predicted that U.S. President Donald Trump would cancel his trip to Denmark after the prime minister refused to sell Greenland to the United States.
title: Did ‘The Simpsons’ Predict Trump Would Try to Buy Greenland?
subtitle: The future-predicting abilities of "The Simpsons" have been exaggerated over the years.
author: Dan Evon
